ilamProfile.title: ILAM PROFILE
ilamProfile.introduction: Tourism is essentially about people and places. Tournem (la Fench derivative tourisme) refers to a journey or travelling of people away from home for a short and temporary visit on a particular tourism circuit.

overview.description: Ilam, which falls in Koshi Province, is one of the popular destinations enjoyed by holidaymakers visiting the eastern part of Nepal. Mr. Yustana Prasad Baraya, a local Culture Expert and Historian of Ilam says 'Ilam is an unpolished diamond, it awaits a proficient sculptor.'
overview.location: Ilam lies between the Mahabharata mountain ranges and offers unspoilt nature, culture and adventure.
characteristics: Land of enchanted beauties with snow-capped towering peaks
Tea gardens spreading sweet aroma of finest tea
Small hilly town with pristine landscapes
Sloped tea gardens and thick natural forests
